src:
福州羽賽周天成直落二擊退王子維

07 Nov 2019, 09:11

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】中國福州羽球公開賽6日進行「台灣內戰」，台灣好手周天成與王子維在男子單打賽事短兵相接，最後由周天成以21：19、21：17直落二擊退王子維。


周天成，圖為資料照。（Robertus Pudyanto/Getty Images)

周天成一開賽就打出一波5：3，並持續拉開比分，不過王子維也鍥而不捨地追成8：8平手，雙方來回拉鋸，9度打成平手，19：19後，周天成連下2分，以21：19先下一城。
第二局開始，王子維以一波4：2攻勢先聲奪人，不過周天成隨即追上，反以6：4超前，打成9：7後，周天成連下5分，王子維持續追趕，好不容易追成17：19僅有2分落後，此時周天成一口氣連拿2分，以21：17收下晉級資格。
而在男單其他選手賽事中，中國諶龍以19：21、12：21、12：21逆轉打敗同胞林丹；女子賽事中，中國好手陳雨菲、泰國依瑟儂（Ratchanok Intanon）都順利晉級。
──轉自《大紀元》
（責任編輯：葉萍）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/07/a102702018.html
text:
Fuzhou Feathers Zhou Tiancheng Straight down two defeated Prince Wei

07 Nov 2019, 09:11

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 07, 2019] The Chinese Fuzhou Badminton Open was held on the 6th of the "Taiwan Civil War". Taiwanese master Zhou Tiancheng and Wang Ziwei met in the men's singles event. Finally, Zhou Tiancheng was 21:19, 21:17. Falling two repels Prince Wei.


Zhou Tiancheng, the picture is a photo. (Robertus Pudyanto/Getty Images)

Zhou Tiancheng played a wave of 5:3, and continued to open the score, but Wang Wei also persevered to chase 8:8 tie, the two sides saw back and forth, 9 degrees tied flat, after 19:19, Zhou Tiancheng continued 2 Points, to 21:19 first city.
At the beginning of the second game, Wang Ziwei took the lead with a wave of 4:2 attack, but Zhou Tiancheng immediately caught up. After 6:4, he scored 9:7 and Zhou Tiancheng scored 5 points. Wang Wei continued to chase after him. At 17:19, only 2 points fell behind. At this time, Zhou Tiancheng scored 2 points in one breath and accepted the promotion qualification at 21:17.
In other men's singles competitions, China's Xiaolong defeated compatriot Lin Dan by 19:21, 12:21, and 12:21. In the women's event, Chinese players Chen Yufei and Thailand's Ratchanok Intanon advanced smoothly.
─Transfer from the Epoch Times
(Editor: Ye Ping)
